title: Senior Software Engineer
subtitle: Staff‑Level CI Reliability & GenAI Integration
fullDescription: In a quest to modernize CI pipelines, I spearheaded the creation of an AI‑powered merge request review agent and forged alliances across engineering and DevOps. Balancing strategic vision with hands‑on development, I crafted training, documentation, and metrics that fueled a company‑wide shift toward GenAI‑driven workflows.
achievements: Unlocked $2M in revenue through critical engineering leadership
Achieved 56% reduction in customer process time
Implemented GenAI pilot with 82% reduction in approval time and 24% reduction in cycle time
Developed services handling ~2000 requests per minute
Delivered hands‑on workshops to 150+ engineers on AI agent best practices
Defined & evangelized the team “North Star” vision to align EMs and PMs

title: Senior Consultant
subtitle: Cross‑Functional Delivery & Strategy
fullDescription: Acting as both strategist and facilitator, I guided three client organizations through complex Java/Spring and React projects. From requirements gathering to sprint execution, I crafted clear roadmaps and fostered collaboration that kept every stakeholder in sync.
achievements: Delivered 5+ cross‑functional projects on time and within scope
Improved sprint predictability by 30% through clear milestone definition
Facilitated client workshops, boosting stakeholder engagement and alignment

title: Senior Software Engineer
subtitle: Java & Scalable Web Applications
fullDescription: On a mission to keep mission‑critical payroll systems running flawlessly, I designed and optimized high‑throughput Spring Boot services. Along the way, I mentored new engineers and shared best practices to elevate the entire team’s performance.
achievements: Sustained 99.9% uptime on critical payroll services
Mentored 4 junior engineers, reducing onboarding time by 25%
Led technical interview panels, contributing to a 20% improvement in hire quality

title: Software Engineer
subtitle: Full‑Stack Insurance Solutions
fullDescription: As the tech lead for a seven‑engineer team, I architected and built a claims processing platform complete with real‑time image scoring and video capture. I also navigated legacy migrations and introduced GraphQL to streamline APIs, all while ensuring top‑tier reliability.
achievements: Delivered claims platform ahead of schedule, improving cycle time by 20%
Designed image scoring system, increasing damage assessment accuracy by 35%
Published Node.js package with 21+ monthly downloads
Led GraphQL rollout, reducing API payload size by 50%
